feed.title: Databag Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Databag: Download Support
entry.content:
• added restriction of binary attachments to admin dashboard
  • enable local download of media files from sealed topics

entry.title: New release for Databag: MFA Support
entry.content: • Client release for mfa support -- feature won't be visible until the next server release which will start when client release completes -- tested with FreeOTP(+) on fdroid

entry.title: New release for Databag: MFA Support v1019
entry.content: • Client release for mfa support -- feature won't be visible until the next server release which will start when client release completes -- tested with FreeOTP(+) on fdroid -- updated build number to resolve previous deployment error

entry.title: New release for Databag: CFTurn & Download
entry.content:
• added support for cloudflare turn service for video/audio calls (an alternative to self-hosting coturn)
  • replaced asset share button with download button for android & fdroid

entry.title: New release for Databag: ContactAcceptFix
entry.content:
• reworded MFA setup modal title
  • fixed error encountered when accept contact requests
